The image used to support the claim is a: year-old photo of activists holding placards in support of Khalistan, unrelated to the current farmers' protest.
The claim was initially shared on Facebo: who suggested that the farmers' protest is motivated by a desire for Khalistan.
The claim was further spread on Twitter: 4. Reverse image search on Google revealed that the image has been used in various articles for representational purposes and was credited to AFP's stringer Narinder Nanu. Tribune India also reported on the event where the image was originally taken, confirming its unrelated context to the farmers' protest.
